Gold.en: An attack that may reduce accuracy.

Silver.en: An attack that may reduce accuracy.

Crystal.en: An attack that may reduce accuracy.

Ruby.en: Fires a lump of ink to damage and cut accuracy.
Ruby.de: Verschießt Tinte und senkt dadurch Genauigkeit.

Sapphire.en: Fires a lump of ink to damage and cut accuracy.
Sapphire.de: Verschießt Tinte und senkt dadurch Genauigkeit.

Emerald.en: Fires a lump of ink to damage and cut accuracy.
Emerald.de: Verschießt Tinte und senkt dadurch Genauigkeit.

FireRed.en: Ink is blasted in the foe’s face or eyes to damage and lower accuracy.
FireRed.de: Schießt Tinte, um Schaden anzurichten und die Genauigkeit zu senken.

LeafGreen.en: Ink is blasted in the foe’s face or eyes to damage and lower accuracy.
LeafGreen.de: Schießt Tinte, um Schaden anzurichten und die Genauigkeit zu senken.

Diamond.en: The user attacks by spraying ink in the foe’s face or eyes. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.
